title: book_Layer_Cake
text:
ISBN-13: 9780802141682.
ISBN-10: 0802141684.
Title: Layer Cake.
Subtitle: Life and Thought in Mexico.
Authors: J. J. Connolly.
Categories: Fiction.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=moH7-dVMlLcC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&edge=curl&source=gbs_api.
Description: Planning to retire on his thirtieth birthday, a drug dealer is given by his boss the opportunity of getting out of the business if he will track down the runaway daughter of his boss's old friend, but his search is complicated by the theft of a fortune in Ecstasy tablets, an angry mob of neo-Nazis, and by a series of betrayals. A first novel. Original. 20,000 first printing. (A Sony Pictures film, releasing Fall 2004, starring Daniel Craig, Michael Gambon, & Colm Meaney) (Suspense).
Published Year: 2004.
Average Rating: 3.99.
Number of Pages: 344.
Ratings Count: 965.
